description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A pioneer's life : protect your town, gather food, explore the wilderness, fight hostile animals, conquier ennemies town... The road is harsh to make a peaceful kingdom.  Pioneerz is the sequel of pioneer. it revisits and improves all aspects of Pioneer(battle, world generation, city building...)
